QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT distinct op.observation_period_id, op.person_id, op.observation_period_start_date, op.observation_period_end_date, op.period_type_concept_id, ch.PartitionId FROM {sc}.observation_period op JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND op.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by ch.PartitionId, op.person_id
